title: Ray-Ban Aviator Carbon Fiber Sunglasses RB8301 004/N8 - Overview
description:
Ray-Ban Aviator Carbon Fiber Sunglasses - RB8301 004/N8 http://www.abt.com/product/45164/Ray-Ban-RB8301004N8.html

It’s all about innovation and use of new materials. This new tech segment in Ray-Ban highlights the use carbon fiber. Carbon fiber and a resin composite creates a lightweight strong flexible and resilient material. This monel aviator has a smaller rounded eye shape and is paired with slim elongated carbon fiber temples. The temples feature the metal Ray-Ban signature logo and rubber temple tips for added comfort and non-slip grip. The lenses are crystal and are available in polar options with anti-reflective and hydro-oleophobic coatings.
Features:
• Signature Ray Ban Logo On Lens And Temples
• Time Less Look
• Tear Drop Shaped Lenses
• Gunmetal Frame
• Grey Polarized Mirror Lenses
